value:
$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|So this is their objective—the
sanctuary at Hjarnhof, hidden in the
northern reaches of Nifl.$k$pThe mountains here are so high that
even wyverns won't dare to fly over
them...$k$pWe've only ever traveled to this
treacherous and frigid region once
before...$k$pI don't like this. Something's not right.$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face|Princess Gunnthrá isn't here.$k$pNo one is. I've searched... Inside and
out.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Smile|I see... Thank you, Laevatein.$k$p$EFace_Anger|What does this tell us?$k$pThis must be their destination. That
means they're after something that
can only be found here...$k$pBut there's nothing here. Nothing
whatsoever! What could they want?$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face_Pain|... I don't know.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|Laevatein. What can you tell me
about the cave we discovered
the last time we came here?$k$pThe one under the mountains,
heading west...$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face|It's blocked by ice. There's no way to
get through.$k$pIt wasn't like that before...$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|No. It wasn't. I suppose we have a
lot to learn about this land.$k$pIf a path like that can suddenly
become closed off...$k$p$EFace_Pain|That's it!$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face|Sister? What is it?$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Anger|I have to learn to think like the
Askrans... And to feel what they're
feeling.$k$pThey're desperate to meet up with
someone... But as long as we stand
in their way, they cannot.$k$pThat would make their next target...
me.$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face_Pain|You?$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Think about it. They led me here, to
this narrow pass, purposefully. Why?
To defeat me.$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face_Pain|But then...$k$pSister! A report!$k$pThe enemy is on its way!$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Pain|They may have managed to outwit
me, this time...$k$pI'm the one that's being hunted.$k$p

$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face_Pain|The enemy is almost here!$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I see. Laevatein, you must escape
while you can.$k$pBy yourself...you can sneak right
past them.$k$pI'll keep them busy until you're safe.$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face_Pain|But...$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Don't worry. I am a general of
Múspell. I have dominion over this
land. I will not lose.$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face|Then let me stay with you!$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Anger|No. This is an order, Laevatein. Go.$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Laegjarn...$k$pI will do as you order.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Anger|As always, you're a good girl,
Laevatein...$k$pDon't worry. We'll meet again soon.$k$pBrave warriors of Askr... I can feel
your malice. You aim to defeat me
here!$k$pBut first, I will show you the power
of Laegjarn, one of the Scorching
Triad of Múspell!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Pain|That's...that's it. That's all I have.$k$pI'm so sorry, Laevatein...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Forces of Múspell, hear me! Your
general, Laegjarn, has been
defeated!$k$pYou have no chance at victory! Flee,
and we will not pursue you.$k$pStay and fight, and we will not go
easy on you. The choice is yours!$k$p

$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Guh...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|So, you've awakened.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|Hello, Princess Fjorm.$k$p$EFace_Pain|It's come to this, I see. Go ahead. Kill
me.$k$pYou'll gain nothing by taking me
hostage. My father would never
bargain for my life.$k$pOr is it to be torture?$k$pI am shamed in defeat. My fate is in
your hands. Do whatever you must.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Now that we have defeated you,
Múspell's forces have been thrown
into chaos.$k$pHeroes were fighting under contract...
But those contracts are now broken.$k$pThe soldiers, meanwhile, have no
idea what to do...$k$pAs for us, we have achieved our
aims. There is no need to spill any
more blood today.$k$p$EFace_Smile|It's not just that. When you conquered
Nifl, you treated the citizens with
dignity. I owe you the same...$k$pI would ask you one thing, however.
Did you wish to invade Nifl? I suspect
you did not.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|I would never answer the questions of
an enemy.$k$pJust remember this... My father is
flame itself. Everything will burn.
Until nothing remains.$k$pHe is the leader of Múspell, and I
follow his orders. That is all.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|I see. And yet I cannot bring myself
to bear a grudge against you...$k$pIf we had not met on the battlefield,
but somewhere more genial... I
think we could have been friends.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$Sbs150|
